text: Hervé Jamar is a Belgian politician. He is a member of the Reformist Movement (MR). He is mayor of Hannut from 1995 to 2014. He became Belgium's Minister of Budget in 2014 but resigned in 2015 in order to become Governor of the Province of Liège. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1965 births Category:20th-century Belgian politicians Category:21st-century Belgian politicians
title: Hervé Jamar
